name: John Boyce
bio: John Boyce is a seasoned golfer with a calm demeanor. He's known for his strategic play and love for the short game. Off the course, he enjoys woodworking and spending time with his dog, Max. His biggest pet peeve is slow play on the greens. He is determined to prove his mettle this season.
prediction: John is expected to lead his team with precision, but his putting consistency will be key in this outing.

name: Jimmy Boyce
bio: Jimmy Boyce is a powerhouse on the course with a swing that can rival the pros. Known for his long drives and competitive spirit, he’s the guy you want on your team. Off the greens, Jimmy is a barbecue enthusiast. His pet peeve is leaving the flag in while putting. Jimmy's recent form hints at a spectacular outing.
prediction: Expect Jimmy to dominate with his distance game, but his short game might need sharpening.

name: Eric Hall
bio: Eric Hall, nicknamed 'The Hammer,' is known for his aggressive playstyle. He loves taking risks and going for the green in two. When not golfing, Eric enjoys hiking and photography. His pet peeve is people who don't rake bunkers. His fiery passion for golf makes him a crowd favorite.
prediction: Eric's risk-taking could pay off big or cost him strokes. It's all or nothing for 'The Hammer.'

name: John Snow
bio: John Snow is a laid-back golfer with a great sense of humor. He's the glue that keeps the team morale high. Off the course, John is an avid chess player. His biggest pet peeve is losing golf balls in hazards. John’s persistence often inspires his team to rally.
prediction: John’s steady play and positive attitude will be a major asset, but his accuracy off the tee could be a concern.

name: Brian Cregan
bio: Brian Cregan is a golf tactician with an uncanny ability to read greens. Off the course, he loves cooking gourmet meals. His pet peeve is when people stand directly behind him while he’s putting. He’s a reliable leader who rarely cracks under pressure.
prediction: Brian will be the strategist on the team, but his focus might be tested under pressure.

name: Andy McDonald
bio: Andy McDonald, or 'Mac,' is known for his consistent iron play and reliable personality. When not golfing, Andy enjoys traveling and exploring new cuisines. His pet peeve is forgetting his ball marker. His sharp focus is admired by both teammates and opponents.
prediction: Mac’s consistency will make him a solid contributor, but his driver accuracy might be a wildcard.

name: Dan Hamilton
bio: Dan Hamilton is a focused golfer with an analytical mind. He’s always calculating the best angles and strategies. Off the course, Dan enjoys reading sci-fi novels. His pet peeve is when people don’t replace their divots. He approaches every shot as though it were a chess move.
prediction: Expect Dan to shine with his precision approach shots, but his putting may need some extra focus.

name: Chris Troyan
bio: Chris Troyan is a golf enthusiast with a passion for the game. Known for his ability to stay calm under pressure, Chris is a great team player. Off the course, he’s a tech whiz. His pet peeve is noisy spectators. He’s the ultimate team motivator during high-stakes matches.
prediction: Chris’s ability to handle pressure will be a game-changer, but his driving distance might lag behind others.

name: Brian Skilton
bio: Brian Skilton lives up to his nickname 'Skillz' with finesse on the green. A reliable golfer and a problem-solver, Brian is always strategizing. He’s also an avid painter. His pet peeve is talking during backswing. Brian’s passion for golf never wavers.
prediction: Brian’s accuracy and creativity will keep his team in the game, but endurance could be a factor.

name: Steve Higbee
bio: Steve Higbee, known as 'Bee,' buzzes through the competition with energy. He’s known for a killer short game and is a foodie who loves experimenting in the kitchen. His pet peeve is people not keeping pace with play. He radiates positivity on and off the course.
prediction: Steve’s stellar short game will save his team crucial strokes, but his putting may need refinement.

name: Bill Tuefel
bio: Bill Tuefel, affectionately called 'Billy T,' is a dependable teammate. Known for his steady play, Bill loves analyzing stats post-game. His pet peeve is leaving clubs on the green. His determination is unmatched when stakes are high.
prediction: Bill will be the steady hand in his team’s success, though his long-game consistency might waver.

name: Tony Marandola
bio: Tony Marandola, known as 'The Marvel,' is one of the most consistent players. He brings charm and skill to every round. Off the course, he loves cinema. His pet peeve is losing tee markers. He remains calm even in intense situations.
prediction: Tony is expected to deliver a standout performance with his signature finesse and reliability.

name: Brian Cusick
bio: Brian Cusick’s nickname, 'The Custodian,' reflects his ability to clean up trouble spots. He enjoys classic rock and weekend fishing trips. His pet peeve is poorly repaired pitch marks. He’s never one to let his team fall behind.
prediction: Brian’s versatility will shine through, although pressure may challenge his usual rhythm.

name: Frank O'Neill
bio: Frank O'Neill is a friendly, approachable golfer who enjoys the camaraderie of the game. Known for his unwavering optimism, Frankie is a joy to play with. His pet peeve is stepping on someone’s putting line. His enthusiasm lights up every round.
prediction: Frank’s positive energy will uplift his team, though his bunker escapes might need refining.

name: Brian McCollum
bio: Brian McCollum, aka 'Mack,' is known for his steady hands and sharp focus. When not golfing, he enjoys woodworking. His pet peeve is slow carts on the course. He thrives in challenging conditions.
prediction: Mack’s calm demeanor and reliability will be pivotal, though his putting could use some polish.

name: Nick Markley
bio: Nick Markley, the 'Marksman,' lives up to his name with laser-focused shots. A fitness enthusiast, Nick believes in staying active for peak performance. His pet peeve is losing balls in water hazards. He’s admired for his resilience under pressure.
prediction: Nick’s precision will be a game-changer, though handling windy conditions might test him.

name: Paul Philson
bio: Paul Philson is an all-rounder who enjoys balancing fun and competitiveness on the course. Off the greens, he loves photography. His pet peeve is broken tees littering the ground. He is always willing to lend advice to teammates.
prediction: Paul will keep things light-hearted while contributing solid performances when needed most.

name: Mark Rowles
bio: Mark Rowles, affectionately called 'Rowdy,' is known for his energetic personality. A golf enthusiast through and through, he also loves DJing on the weekends. His pet peeve is lack of etiquette on the greens. Mark’s competitive nature drives his performance.
prediction: Mark’s enthusiasm will be contagious, but managing his focus during high-pressure shots will be key.

name: Sam Novak
bio: Sam Novak, known as 'Slammin’ Sam,' is a big hitter who thrives on power shots. Off the course, he enjoys outdoor adventures. His pet peeve is noisy carts near tee boxes. Sam’s personality is as big as his swing.
prediction: Sam’s driving will be an asset, though his precision around the greens could make or break his score.

name: Noel Morning
bio: Noel Morning, nicknamed 'Sunrise,' is an early riser who loves dawn tee times. Known for his disciplined approach, he’s always well-prepared. His pet peeve is waiting too long on the tee box. Noel brings a calming presence to the game.
prediction: Noel’s discipline will serve him well, but his ability to adapt to unexpected challenges will be tested.
